PEACE IN PRACTICE AIMS TO:

Advance quality, reach, effectiveness and innovation in mental health and psychosocial support strategies for diverse organizations (UN, governments, local and international NGOs, educational institutions) and individuals through capacity building; training; service; publications and best practice guidelines; presentations and forums. 

Promote conscious living, leadership, action and education through attention to human rights, social justice and fairness, equality, diversity, non-violent dialogue, environmental sustainability and kindness.

Advance personal and group transformational skills and processes through complementary strategies:  mindfulness, yoga, storytelling in all its forms, poetry and music.', 'title': 'Founder', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 68306523, 'name': 'The MHPSS Collaborative', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGec9JzWUkibw/company-logo_400_400/0/1682330193452?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=0LP4ZhfbJbRuwFpuuUHyQ2-R1UCXMcbJZAz-2L5_V60', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-mhpss-collaborative/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Copenhagen, Capital Region, Denmark', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'The MHPSS Collaborative', 'description': 'Follow the Collaborative on Twitter: @MHPSSCollabora1 
Hosted by Save the Children, the MHPSS Collaborative is a global platform for Mental Health and Psychosocial Support research, innovation, learning and advocacy. We connect key academic and humanitarian actors with local civil society to give children and families in fragile circumstances the possibility to thrive, to learn and play, and to develop to their full potential. 
Based upon meaningful relationships and local realities and solutions, the Collaborative: Convenes local to global stakeholders for MHPSS sharing, exchange, learning and innovation; Facilitates interagency MHPSS implementation science to promote innovation, quality and scale; Engages local communities of practice to lift learning from local MHPSS innovation to global exchange; Distills and Disseminates MHPSS knowledge, evidence and resources; and Champions the critical contribution of MHPSS to the recovery and survival of children and families in fragile contexts through evidence-based advocacy and policy.', 'title': 'Director, MHPSS Collaborative for Children and Families in Adversity', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'War Trauma Foundation', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'War Trauma Foundation', 'description': 'Responsible for programme development, content, evaluation and quality assurance; strategic mission development and implementation; collaborative knowledge development and dissemination; leading international training initiatives.
